questions.question: A machine learning engineer is tasked with setting up a training environment for a new deep learning project on AWS. They want to use a pre-built container that includes TensorFlow and its dependencies. Which option would best suit their needs?
options: Create a custom container from scratch.
Use an Amazon SageMaker pre-built TensorFlow container.
Use an Amazon Elastic Container Service (Amazon ECS) container.
Use an Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) container.
correct_answers: Use an Amazon SageMaker pre-built TensorFlow container.
